column5: Anyone know what the launch is like on Onaman Lake coming from Pasha Lake Cabins?

I don't think you can drive right to the lake. I thought they restricted access by stopping the road a bit before it gets to the lake. Pasha has boats stashed there so I would call Chad at the camp to find out the details.
We are going there for the first time and were bringing a 16ft alumacraft console drive. just trying to find out some lakes that are not super difficult to access with a 4wd  truck

The best lakes are the ones that you can't drive right to the shore. Believe it or not the lakes up there are heavily pressured but that doesn't mean you won't do well if the timing is right. Grab a map and explore a bit and if you catch fish DO NOT tell the camp owner or anyone else there. The lake may very well be fished down by the next season.

we went to a place by by geraldton witch is not far away. i understand what you are saying but we difinently know that nothing up there is really shore access. were willing to go through a couple of canadian carwashes we just wouldnt be able to carry our boat
You won't find many guys up there spilling the beans on where to fish
